effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.x_y: While resisting, the user attacks the opposing Pokémon. This lowers the Sp. Atk stat of those hit.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: While resisting, the user attacks the opposing Pokémon. This lowers the Sp. Atk stat of those hit.
